hero.name: Ubirajara Filho
hero.title: QA Analyst
hero.description: Expert in test automation, DevOps practices, and quality culture. Building scalable test architectures and implementing shift-left testing in agile environments with continuous delivery.

about.title: About Me
about.bio1: I'm a professional passionate about software quality, focusing on
about.bio2End: at UESB, I constantly seek to improve my skills and contribute to projects that value technical excellence and continuous delivery.
about.goalDescription: Work as a QA Analyst valuing automation, DevOps, and quality from planning.
about.differentialDescription: Technical identification of failures, scalable test architectures, and shift-left testing.
about.imageAlt: Photo of Ubirajara Filho - QA Analyst

sgdoctor.name: SGDoctor Academic
sgdoctor.description: Acting as QA in SGDoctor Academic, with manual and automated tests, requirements validation, and bug documentation.

saucedemo.name: E2E Automation on SauceDemo
saucedemo.description: Complete suite of automated E2E tests with Cypress, including reports with JUnit and Mochawesome and continuous integration with GitHub Actions.

codeceptjs.name: API Automation with CodeceptJS
codeceptjs.description: API test automation project using CodeceptJS with Mocha framework and detailed reports with Allure.

automationPractice.name: E2E Automation on Automation Practice
automationPractice.description: Automated E2E tests for Automation Practice e-commerce, using dynamic data with FakerJS for realistic scenarios.

restfulApi.name: API Automation on Restful API Dev
restfulApi.description: Automated REST API tests using Cypress, validating endpoints, responses, and data flows.

mobileAutomation.name: Mobile Automation on QAzando Food
mobileAutomation.description: Automated E2E tests on QAzando Food app, using Robot Framework + Appium with execution on BrowserStack as Device Farm.

contact.title: Let's Talk?
contact.description: I'm always open to new opportunities, collaborations, and interesting projects. Don't hesitate to get in touch!
